The video was published on Facebook on A: 2019, and has been viewed more than 1,400 times.
The video: s caption in Hindi translates to English as "Lungis of five Congress workers caught fire while burning the effigy of Modi."
The same video was previously published: 2012, with the headline "Funny fire accident during KSU protest" and on the YouTube channel of Asianet News TV with the headline "Lucky Fire Escape for KSU workers in Pathanamthitta."
